summary: A class that encapsulates a pretrained Fairseq Sequence-to-Sequence Machine Translation (FSMT) model, handling configuration, weight loading, and ready-to-use inference capabilities for multilingual translation tasks.
business_intent: Provide developers with an out‑of‑the‑box, high‑quality translation engine that can be integrated into applications to deliver fast, accurate multilingual text translation without the need for custom model training.
